column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I went here for my boyfriend's birthday
column2: and all of the food was really really good! We did a whole spread! We got the baked crab cakes
column5: and white fish salad that was on the specials menu. My gosh
column6: everything was so absolutely delicious! In our opinion though
column7: the baked crab cakes were the star of our dinner! Do not sleep on those baked crab cakes!! Also I must add that the service here was amazing!
